result.eng: What is the subject of the chapter?
result.html: Cad is ábhar don chaibidilWhat is the subject of the chapter?
result.ponchtml: Cad is áḃar don ċaibidilWhat is the subject of the chapter?

result.eng: My favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ga: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.orig: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.html: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ponchtml: Is í an ṁatamaitic an t-áḃar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.

result.eng: That is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ga: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.orig: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.html: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábharThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ponchtml: Sin iomlán m'eolais ar an áḃarThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ga: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach
result.orig: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach
result.html: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas EorpachWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ponchtml: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reaċtúil de ḃua ár mballraíoċta san Aontas EorpaċWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: The Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.
result.ga: Leagtar srianta ar an nGobharnóir de bhua Acht an Bhainc Ceannais

result.ponchtml: Leagtar srianta ar an nGoḃarnóir de ḃua Aċt an Ḃainc CeannaisThe Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.

result.eng: It is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.
result.ga: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainn
